**Annual production**

We calculated total annual aquaculture production per municipality, as follows:
$$
\begin{equation}
Tot.prod = \triangle Biomass + Harvest - Discard - Seeded\ smolts
\end{equation}
$$
 




**Economic feed conversion ratio (eFCR)**

$$
\begin{equation}
eFCR = \frac{Feed \ used,\ kg}{Biomass\ produced,\ kg}
\end{equation}
$$


**Lice prevalence**

$$
\begin{equation}
Lice \ index = \sum_{i = 1}^{N \ of \ sites}[\frac{n \ weeks\ below \ threshold}{total\ weeks}]
\end{equation}
$$



**Environmentlal monitoring - MOM B scores**
$$
\begin{equation}
MOMB \ index  = 1 - (\frac{MTB_{farms \ scored \ 3 \ and \ 4}}{MTB_{municipality \ total}})
\end{equation} 
$$ 
**Escapees index**
$$
\begin{equation}
Escapees \ index = \frac{\sum_{j=1}^{N}[\frac{\sum_{i=1}^{n}(incidence\ score_i)}{n}]}{N}
\end{equation}
$$
